page.title: 11A CATHOLIC COMMUNITY
page.content: Most of the population here in our area are Catholic and religion plays a big part in their lives. On a Sunday morning everybody except the very sick goes to Mass. Afterwards they wait outside the church to chat. Sunday is a day for being dressed, and resting and enjoying sport or visiting friends. Some people go to Mass daily in Sixmilecross. The Catholic religion is practised in the home as well. There is also reminders in the home like sacred heart pictures and crucfixes,the crib at Christmas,the Lady altar in May and the lighted candle in times of joy and sadness.Not long ago in our parish a new church was built, and was paid for in a short time. Our priests say that we are very generous. We know our priests well and they visit our homes especially when someone is sick.
